name: OR_LNLG_LITHO_PT_PROC_APP
description: This table contains information about patient protection during a lithotripsy procedure.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_PROTECTION_APPLIED_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores information about patient protection applied during the lithotripsy procedure.
